A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie was an abomination. The humor was ridiculous and mood shattering\, no mood killing. The plot holes were massive\, so big you could fit snoke's ship through them. Then\, the ridiculous political messaging was insulting. Not because i care about men always being the hero\, or because i particularly love capitalism\, but i don't want my face rubbed in anyone's political agenda without my express consent. \n\nI hated this movie.
